name: Document_documentTypeTest
description: Unit tests for the DocumentType functionality within the Document class.

test_cases.name: testDocumentTypeFound
test_cases.description: Tests that the document type is correctly found and returned when appended to the document.

test_cases.name: testDocumentTypeNotFound
test_cases.description: Tests that the document type is correctly identified as not found when no document type is appended.

test_cases.name: testDocumentTypeFoundAfterLeafNode
test_cases.description: Tests that the document type is correctly found and returned even when appended after a leaf node (text node).
